entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then south 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 11.
